content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Hello Ryanah,

Thank you for your interest in renting the apartment. I am willing to negotiate the rental price with you, but I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible price for my property.

Based on the size and location of the apartment, I was thinking a rental price of 1,500 Euros per month would be fair. However, I am open to discussing other options.

What do you think would be a fair rental price for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1,500 Euros per month. Thank you for your cooperation.

Can I ask you a few questions about the apartment before I sign the lease agreement?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Of course, I would be happy to answer any questions you may have about the apartment before you sign the lease agreement.

What specific questions do you have?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you tell me more about the building and its amenities?

Also, is there a parking space included in the rental price?

Lastly, can you tell me about the maintenance process and who is responsible for paying for maintenance costs?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Sure! The building is a modern and well-maintained complex with a fitness center, swimming pool, and a rooftop garden for residents to enjoy. There is also a laundry room on-site for your convenience.

Unfortunately, there is no parking space included in the rental price. However, there are several parking options available nearby at an additional cost.

In terms of maintenance, I am responsible for maintaining the building and its common areas. However, any maintenance work needed for the apartment itself will be the responsibility of the tenant. I will provide you with a list of recommended vendors for any repairs or maintenance work that may be needed.

Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
